info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:21PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SUNFLOWER...LEFLORE AND NORTHERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 621 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Minter City to near Avon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Minter City around 625 PM CDT. Isola around 705 PM CDT. Belzoni around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Schlater, Doddsville and Morgan City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
